entry.title: GAP entry short stop $6.89, exit buy stop $7.41
entry.summary:
This is a second paper trade according to my new experimental trading strategy.

Entry short stop \$6.89

Exit buy stop \$7.41

Target \$3.50

Risk = \$7.41 - \$6.89 = 0.52

Reward = \$6.89 - 3.50 = 3.39

Reward / Risk = 2.87 ... still not the 3-fold I'm seeking...

Update: It seems that GAP shares are hard to borrow. So I can't even enter a paper trade. I'll just watch this one from the sideline.
